name: Offensive Qualities 3
description: Advanced offensive and weapon qualities for all Digimon

qualities.name: COORDINATED ASSAULT
qualities.description:
**REQUIREMENT: STAGE 3, AGGRESSIVE FLANK**

The Digimon may now attempt to mark a single target as 1 **Action**. The Digimon must make a **BIT (Precision) Check**.

**Success**: The Target becomes **Marked**.
**Critical Success**: The Target also immediately suffers a -1 **DOD** penalty.

A Target who is **Marked** gains a **DOD** Penalty equal to the Digimon's **Stage** instead of the normal -1 Penalty for each **Attack** which targets it past the first one in each **Round** of Combat. This affects **DATA SPECIALIZATION: UNCATCHABLE TARGET** and **ABSOLUTE EVASION**, but not **SPEEDSTER**.

qualities.name: CHROME DIGIZOID WEAPONRY
qualities.description:
**REQUIREMENT: STAGE 3, WEAPON**
**INCOMPATIBLE: ALGORITHM QUALITIES**

The Digimon's **[WEAPON]** Tagged Attacks gain +2 **ACC** and +1 **DAM**.

qualities.name: CURSED DIGIZOID WEAPONRY
qualities.description:
**REQUIREMENT: STAGE 4, WEAPON**
**INCOMPATIBLE: ALGORITHM QUALITIES**

The Digimon's **[WEAPON]** Tagged Attacks gain +2 **ACC** and +1 **DAM**.

When at Maximum **Wound Boxes**, the Digimon takes a -1 **DAM** penalty to **[WEAPON]** Tagged Attacks.

When the Digimon is at half its maximum **Wound Boxes** or fewer, it gains +2 **DAM** to **[WEAPON]** Tagged Attacks.

qualities.name: ADAPTIVE DIGIZOID WEAPONRY
qualities.description:
**REQUIREMENT: STAGE 4, WEAPON**
**INCOMPATIBLE: ALGORITHM QUALITIES**

At the start of the **Round**, the Digimon gains 5 points which it can use to grant its **[WEAPON]** Tagged Attacks a bonus to either **ACC** or **DAM**. It can split these points up as it sees fit.

If a Digimon has this Quality alongside **ADAPTIVE DIGIZOID ARMOR**, it is immune to **[DISARM]**.

qualities.name: SHARP DIGIZOID WEAPONRY
qualities.description:
**REQUIREMENT: STAGE 4, WEAPON**
**INCOMPATIBLE: ALGORITHM QUALITIES**

The Digimon's **[WEAPON]** Tagged Attacks gain +4 **ACC**.

The Digimon's **[DAMAGE] [WEAPON]** Tagged Attacks deal 1 **Unalterable Damage** on a hit.

qualities.name: HEAVY DIGIZOID WEAPONRY
qualities.description:
**REQUIREMENT: STAGE 4, WEAPON**
**INCOMPATIBLE: ALGORITHM QUALITIES**

The Digimon's **[WEAPON]** Tagged Attacks gain +5 **DAM**.

The Digimon suffers a -1 penalty to its **Movement**, but gains +1 to **DOS**.

qualities.name: FLEXIBLE DIGIZOID WEAPONRY
qualities.description:
**REQUIREMENT: STAGE 4, WEAPON**
**INCOMPATIBLE: ALGORITHM QUALITIES**

The Digimon gains +1 **BIT** and +3 **DOD**, and its **[WEAPON]** Tagged Attacks are treated as if they are benefiting from 1 **Rank** of **Reach**.

If the Digimon already has **Reach**, its benefits stack with this Quality.

qualities.name: LIGHT DIGIZOID WEAPONRY
qualities.description:
**REQUIREMENT: STAGE 4, WEAPON**
**INCOMPATIBLE: ALGORITHM QUALITIES**

The Digimon's **[WEAPON]** Tagged Attacks gain +3 **ACC** and +3 **DAM**.

The Digimon's **[WEAPON]** Tagged Attacks gain a single Automatic **ACC** success on every **Accuracy Check** it makes. This stacks with **CERTAIN STRIKE**.

qualities.name: SHINING DIGIZOID WEAPONRY
qualities.description:
**REQUIREMENT: STAGE 4, WEAPON**
**INCOMPATIBLE: ALGORITHM QUALITIES**

The Digimon's **[WEAPON]** Tagged Attacks gain +5 **ACC** and +1 **DAM**.

The Digimon **[WEAPON]** Tagged Attacks gain an additional bonus:

**[MELEE]**: The **Attack** deals a minimum **Damage** of 2 after **Armor** if it has the **[DAMAGE]** Tag or gains +1 **Duration** on a successful hit if it has the **[SUPPORT]** Tag.
**[RANGE]**: The **Attack** gains +3 to **Range** and **Effective Limit**.

qualities.name: PURE DIGIZOID WEAPONRY
qualities.description:
**REQUIREMENT: STAGE 4, WEAPON, ALGORITHM**
**INCOMPATIBLE: OTHER DIGIZOID WEAPONRY QUALITIES**

The Digimon's **[WEAPON]** Tagged Attacks gain a +2 to **DAM** and **ACC**.

The Digimon gains the **[OFFHAND]** Tag independent from the **[WEAPON]** Tags it already has, which is treated as if it is **Rank 2 [WEAPON]** Tag.

Both **Weapon Tags** may be applied to the same **Attack** if it is a **Signature Move**, but the bonus to the **Attack** due to **[WEAPON]** cannot exceed 4 + the Digimon's current **Battery**.

When this Digimon would suffer **[DISARM]**, the one applying the Effect must target either the **[WEAPON]** or **[OFFHAND]** Tag, and cannot remove both at once.
